actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Economic Development Administration to make grants to producers of taconite for implementation of new technologies to increase productivity, to reduce costs, and to improve overall product quality and performance.

summary.text: Taconite Research Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Economic Development Administration to make grants to producers of taconite to implement new technologies to increase productivity, to reduce costs, and to improve overall product quality and performance.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Economic Development Administration to make grants to producers of taconite for implementation of new technologies to increase productivity, to reduce costs, and to improve overall product quality and performance.
